meanings.definition: A person who passes by or through a place.
meanings.sent1: The passers walked quickly past the park.
meanings.sent2: The busy street was filled with passers going about their day.
meanings.sent3: The passers paused to admire the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The passers flowed like a river through the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The passers left a trail of footprints behind them.

meanings.definition: A person who successfully completes a test or examination.
meanings.sent1: The top students were the passers of the challenging exam.
meanings.sent2: She was relieved to be one of the passers in the final test.
meanings.sent3: The passers celebrated their success with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: Being a passer in the exam felt like winning a trophy.
meanings.sent5: The passers proudly displayed their certificates on the wall.

meanings.definition: A device for transferring something from one side to another.
meanings.sent1: The conveyor belt acted as a passers for the boxes.
meanings.sent2: The passers smoothly moved the items from one end to the other.
meanings.sent3: The passers in the factory made work more efficient.
meanings.sent4: The passers resembled a bridge connecting two parts of the warehouse.
meanings.sent5: The passers helped transport goods with ease.
